author: pinkykyra
text:
It's just total anger right now...
Total fucking anger. This is why I don't draw when I'm upset, I can't concentrate. I don't know how everybody else can. https://t.co/bauaCKAgMj

author: pinkykyra
text: The announcer also gets me lol

author: pinkykyra
text:
"EEEE" - Likitung
😂😂😂
The greatest and funniest mini-game I have ever played in my life.
(but Ekans's and Clefairy's mini-game are pretty fun too <33)
https://t.co/4MWqD8xjqS

author: pinkykyra
text:
I hate when I have a perfectly good sentence in my head when I'm writing my stories,

And then my brain holds the backspace key and deletes it all for me... 😒😑

author: pinkykyra
text:
I've been in the dark, in what seems like forever. I wasn't sure if I could ever get out. But then... I found out what made me... me.

Finally, I'm getting somewhere.
<33

author: pinkykyra
text:
Going through a change that will affect my YouTube and posts everywhere across my socials.

It's going to be a while but, I have to figure out how I want my content and posts to be, than what they are currently.

#anxiety #mentalhealth #change #identity #socialmedia

author: pinkykyra
text:
Most of the time it involves technology 😅 Not much else.

I know I'm here, but Google and YouTube does exist guys. It's how I learned! ❤

#technology #family #Libras https://t.co/nlBflalz6u

author: pinkykyra
text:
My older cousins used to tease me because I liked Yoshi, and they thought he was lame

Now I just don't give a f*ck
lol Yoshi is badass what you guys mean?
Plus, he's adorable!~ C'mon now...

author: pinkykyra
text:
It's 4AM and I'm up thinking about how to do social media correctly

How the f*ck does that work for an awkward, shy, dork like myself again??

What's the "krabby patty secret formula"? 😆😅 I need to know

author: pinkykyra
text:
Sharing for a fellow writer and friend~ Please, if can #donate ANYTHING, that's all that is needed to make this happen!~ 

(Especially if you like #horror #films 🎥🎬👀)

🖤🖤🖤

ZUGZWANG - An MFA Thesis Short Horror Film https://t.co/Xg7LOE4Tyk

author: pinkykyra
text: Stress has been beating the shit out me, and so now I just can't help but feel depressed. Be patient with me. It's not easy getting back up, at least for me.

author: pinkykyra
text:
Deer generally eat at the following times: 

Early morning
Dusk
Middle of the night
Noon
---

Perhaps, choosing a deer to be my fursona is a well informed decision 💖😋

Because I eat almost every few hours 😂😂
